meta.name: riak
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: Riak
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT max("node_get_fsm_objsize_median") AS "median", max("node_get_fsm_objsize_100") AS "100th-percentile", max("node_get_fsm_objsize_99") AS "99th-percentile", max("node_get_fsm_objsize_mean") AS "mean", max("node_get_fsm_objsize_95") AS "95th-percentile" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."riak"

SELECT max("node_get_fsm_siblings_median") AS "median", max("node_get_fsm_siblings_mean") AS "mean", max("node_get_fsm_siblings_99") AS "99th-percentile", max("node_get_fsm_siblings_95") AS "95h-percentile", max("node_get_fsm_siblings_100") AS "100th-percentile" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."riak"
SELECT max("node_put_fsm_time_median") / 1000 AS "median_put_milliseconds", max("node_get_fsm_time_median") / 1000 AS "median_get_milliseconds" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."riak"
SELECT max("node_puts") AS "puts_per_minute", max("node_gets") AS "gets_per_minute" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."riak"
